title: E. Sum and product
statement: You are given integers N and D. Find N positive integers x1...xN such that the difference of their product and their sum equals D.
inputSpecification: The only line of input contains integers N (2 ≤ N ≤ 1000) and D (0 ≤ D ≤ 1000).
outputSpecification: Output N integers that satisfy the given condition in non-decreasing order (in a single line, separated with spaces). Note that some numbers can be equal. Numbers printed by you must not exceed 106.
name: Sum and product
